## Background

Hi, my name is Erin Carmody. On this page, you can find information regarding my education, job experiences, hobbies, and career aspirations.

## Education

-   Received bachelor's degrees for finance and information systems from the University of Pittsburgh at Johnstown in April 2022
-   Currently working towards master's degree in data analytics at the University of Charleston in West Virginia

## Job Experiences

-   From June-August of 2021 and 2022, I interned at the Federal Home Loan Bank in Pittsburgh in their Data Services Department.
    -   assisted with development of a workflow in Informatica
    -   used SQL coding to extract data from their tables and organize spreadsheets 
    - published Tableau dashboards to identify any errors
-   I coach at Pittsburgh Elite Volleyball Association where I train female athletes in the fundamentals of volleyball.

## Hobbies and Interests

-   I have played volleyball since I was 13 years old and played collegiate.
-   I love the author Colleen Hoover. My favorite book from her is Verity.
-   I enjoy outdoor activities like hiking, skiing, and wake boarding.

## Career Aspirations

-   Upon completion of my master's degree, I hope to work as a data analyst in my hometown of Pittsburgh, PA.
